title: My client wont open at all
body: It has opened and was fine now it just wont

replies.body: If it doesnt open press CTRL+ALT+DEL, press TASK MANAGER, in task manager goto section PROCESSES, find LEAGUECLIENT.EXE, and press END THIS PROCESS. After that try reopen client. If u cant be stuffed restarting yout pc  this is the most convenient way to make it work again

Cause this helps find your problem doesnt it?
Explain what the problem is......
